name: UI2: Figma's Design System
description:
This file contains the Figma design language and system. It includes the styles, components, and variants Figma’s design team uses everyday to design Figma itself, as well as some instructions and best practices. We’re sharing it publicly here as it may be helpful for anything from creating plugins, to exploring ideas, or even creating guides for your team on using Figma.


We call it “UI2" because it’s the second formal iteration of our design system. We wrote a little bit about the process behind our April 2019 redesign here. We’re hoping to work on UI3 this year, so if you have ideas on how the system could be improved, feel free to reach out!
